title: Mobile-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Establishing a flexible mobile learning environment using learners’ personal devices (BYOD). Operating blended classes that integrate in-person lectures and online activities.

learning_goals: Learners voluntarily participate in language learning activities at least three times per week using a mobile app.
Learners can accurately utilize practical expressions of the target language with over 80% accuracy through mobile-based interactive content (e.g., quizzes, role-plays).
Learners conduct language practice sessions with peer learners at least twice a week using mobile collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
